text: Paul was an excellent host. The room was large and comfortable and came with a closet. The place was neat and clean. Paul was very friendly. He has a dog which is very tame and like Paul friendly. The building is a short walk to the subway, downtown Brooklyn, Tkts booth (you can walk or take the subway 1 stop) banks/atms, food stores, restaurants, and other services. He charges a fair price for his location. I highly recommend him.
listing_name: Spacious room in cozy Boerum Hill
